Anyways, I'll keep the torrent on my computer until one of the good people of the pirate bay can provide instructions better than the uploaders.

Come on guys, you're complaining about the uploader  being stupid, but none of you actually managed to look inside the folders and see where it matches in the game install directory?

Instructions : 

1. Install by mounting ISO ( poweriso or daemon tools ) 

2. Install updates 1 - 5 ( I copied the crack over every time just in case )

3. copy the content of the dlc folders ( for example Jimmys Vendatta folder includes "Edit" "pc" and "launcher.exe" copy these to inside the "Mafia II" folder. ) Simply look at the content inside the folders and look which folders it matches in the mafia 2 directory. 

4.  Copy the Update 5 crack to your "Mafia II" folder.

5. Done! 

If your screen goes black right after you set the brightness. simply alt + tab, and alt + tab in to the game again.

Why did this guy try to sneak a Nirvana album in here? To inadvertently get us to listen to his favorite music? Lol whatever bro, the album's been out for 20 some years now, I'm sure countless people have already listened to it.

A badass game though, thanks alot for sharing it and the expansions.
